name: Abysmal Ants: Mining But Cooler
description:
Description

At an undefined place, deep inside an abstract world, abysmal entities exist! Spawn new entities, gather food and explore the world in order to expand your colony!
___________________________________________________

Controls

Left Click | Action
Right Click | Move the Camera
Mouse Wheel / Keys + - | Zoom In/Out
Keys 1-4 | Spawn Respective Entities

___________________________________________________

The Team

Design and Coding: GeorgyAngelov, BloodyStupidViktor, Pulni
Visuals: Virimine, NefiLouko
